review: Anytime I try to use Netflix it loses internet connection. None of my other wireless devices have this problem so I'm assuming it is an issue with the fire stick after going to forums online and seeing a lot of other people with the same issue.
author: Ralph Byerly Jr.

review: After a few internet issues were fixed, I finally got stick connected properly. This was a gift and one I'll use for a very long time. At times I'm torn between using it all the time, but I still need my regular TV programs. Great product!
author: Thomas D

review: My firestick just stopped working after 7 months of not even heavy use. Going back to apple tv and casting from my Ipad from Amazon prime.
author: Signifying Monkey "The Signifying Monkey"

review: this device is not compatible with #DVI or #VGA port, an attempt to use #HDMI adapter also failed!
author: Ali Mahdavi

review: I've had this a couple of days and we are very happy  with it. So far,  it was worth the money.  We can watch streaming videos and it was easy to install.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Our old, old Roku was on the fritz. I saw the Fire TV Stick on a special Prime deal. Couldn't beat the price. The interface is great. Apps are very smooth. As our other streaming devices age out, we'll be replacing them with the Fire TV Stick.
author: N.G.
